item.title: 关税阴云笼罩企业盈利，即便企业已逐渐适应
item.description: 许多美国企业试图向投资者保证关税是"可控的"，但财报季初期的评论表明，随着消费者对价格上涨的抵触情绪加剧，利润率正面临风险。【原文：Many U.S. companies have sought to reassure investors that tariffs are "manageable," but early earnings-season comments suggest profit margins are at risk with consumers balking at higher prices.】

item.title: 加拿大央行周三将维持利率不变，未来货币政策取决于美加贸易谈判进展
item.description: 加拿大央行普遍预计将于周三维持政策利率在2.25%不变，但由于经济前景存在不确定性，经济学家和货币市场对加拿大今年剩余时间的货币政策走向存在分歧。【原文：The Bank of Canada is widely expected to keep its policy interest rate ​on hold at 2.25% on Wednesday but economists and money markets are divided over where Canada's monetary policy cycle ‌is headed for the rest of the year due to economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美联储会议恐因央行独立性受威胁而蒙上阴影
item.description: 美联储本周会议预计将维持利率不变，但会议氛围受到多重因素影响：特朗普政府正对美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔展开刑事调查，美联储理事丽莎·库克面临解职动议，且鲍威尔的继任者提名程序将于五月启动。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady this week at a meeting overshadowed by a Trump administration criminal investigation of U.S. central bank chief Jerome Powell, an evolving effort to fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook, and the coming nomination of a successor to take over for Powell in May.】

item.title: Meta、TikTok和YouTube将因青少年成瘾指控接受法庭审判
item.description: Meta Platforms、TikTok和YouTube本周将面临法庭审查，因其平台被指助长青少年心理健康危机，而关于儿童屏幕使用时间的全国性辩论正进入新阶段。【原文：Meta Platforms, TikTok and YouTube will face courtroom scrutiny this week over allegations that their platforms are fueling a youth mental health crisis, as the national debate about kids’ screen time enters a new phase.】

item.title: 焦点：制药企业转向人工智能以加速临床试验和监管申报
item.description: 行业高管表示，人工智能尚未解决药物研发中最具挑战性的环节——发现能带来重大医学突破的新分子——但它已开始优化研发过程中那些不那么引人注目的环节。【原文：Artificial intelligence has yet to deliver on the most challenging aspect of drug development -- finding new molecules that lead to major medical advances -- but it is already streamlining less glamorous parts of the process, industry executives say.】

item.title: 金矿股价飙升，因金价创下每盎司5100美元的历史新高
item.description: 黄金矿业股周一盘前交易中大幅上涨，因金价飙升至每盎司5100美元的历史新高，延续了由地缘政治不确定性和市场波动引发的避险需求推动的历史性涨势。【原文：Shares of gold miners jumped in premarket trading on Monday, as bullion prices surged to a ​record high of $5,100 an ounce, extending a historic ‌rally driven by safe-haven demand amid geopolitical uncertainties and market volatility.】

item.title: 冬季风暴导致美国交通瘫痪，致使大量航班取消
item.description: 截至周一早间，已有超过3600个航班被取消，714个航班延误，此前周日报告的航班取消量已超过11000个。【原文：Over 3,600 flights were canceled and 714 were delayed as of early Monday, following more than 11,000 cancellations reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 韩国现代制铁计划为美国钢铁厂增资29亿美元
item.description: 韩国现代制铁周一在监管文件中表示，其关联企业现代浦项路易斯安那有限责任公司计划增资29亿美元，用于美国钢铁厂的设施投资。【原文：South ​Korea's Hyundai Steel said in a ‌regulatory filing on Monday its affiliate Hyundai-POSCO Louisiana LLC plans a capital increase worth $2.9 billion for facilities investment in a US steel ‌plant.】

item.title: 欧盟就Grok平台性化图像问题对X平台展开调查，议员称
item.description: 欧洲议会爱尔兰籍议员雷吉娜·多尔蒂周一发表声明称，欧盟委员会已就埃隆·马斯克旗下人工智能聊天机器人Grok生成露骨图像一事展开调查。【原文：The European Commission has launched an investigation into Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok over the production of explicit imagery, Regina Doherty, a member of the European parliament representing Ireland, said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 日本央行货币市场数据显示，日本周五未干预外汇市场
item.description: 日本银行周一公布的货币市场数据显示，上周五日元兑美元汇率的飙升很可能并非日本官方干预的结果。【原文：Bank of Japan money market data on Monday indicated that a spike in the yen rate against the dollar on Friday was not likely the product of official Japanese intervention.】

item.title: 黄金因避险需求飙升至5100美元历史新高
item.description: 周一，金价延续创纪录涨势，飙升至5100美元上方。各国央行和投资者纷纷寻求避险，以规避地缘政治风险以及特朗普引发的市场波动。【原文：Gold prices extended their record-setting rally to ​surge past $5,100 on Monday as central banks and investors sought refuge from geopolitical risks and Trump-induced ‌market volatility.】

item.title: 《商报》报道：欧盟委员会将于周一对Grok公司启动诉讼程序
item.description: 据德国《商报》周一援引三名欧盟高级官员的消息报道，欧盟委员会将于本周一依据《数字服务法》对埃隆·马斯克的人工智能聊天机器人Grok启动调查程序。【原文：The EU Commission will open proceedings against Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok under the Digital Services Act on Monday, Germany's Handelsblatt reported on Monday, citing three high-ranking EU officials.】

item.title: 美国利率检查掩盖了协调干预日元的巨大障碍
item.description: 纽约联储此次不同寻常的利率检查，引发了持续疲软的日元汇率突然飙升，这降低了干预的门槛，但美日两国协调抛售美元的行动在现阶段仍极不可能发生。【原文：The unusual rate check by the New York Federal Reserve that triggered a spike in the stubbornly weak yen has lowered the threshold for intervention, but coordinated Japan-U.S. selling of dollars still looks highly unlikely at this stage.】

item.title: 日本央行认为日元疲软对通胀的提振作用正在增强
item.description: 日本央行周一表示，日元疲软对日本通胀的影响日益加剧，因企业正积极将成本上涨转嫁给消费者。此举表明央行正密切关注不断加剧的价格压力，这可能需要进一步加息。【原文：A weak yen has an increasing impact on Japan's inflation as firms actively pass on rising costs, the central bank said on Monday, signalling its vigilance over mounting price pressures that may warrant more rises in interest rates.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司喷气机制造首席执行官在订单激增后瞄准更高产量
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）首席商务执行官表示，随着近期其支线飞机订单激增，该公司计划在未来两年内将年度交付量恢复至疫情前约100架的水平，并在此基础上实现进一步增长。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer aims to restore annual deliveries to pre-pandemic levels of around 100 units within the next two years and then grow further following a recent boom in orders for its regional jets, its top commercial executive said.】

item.title: 独家：LVMH投资者要求明确伯纳德·阿诺特继任计划
item.description: 部分LVMH股东正寻求明确伯纳德·阿诺特计划如何以及向谁移交这家奢侈品巨头的领导权——他已掌舵近40年。股东们表示，缺乏透明度正日益成为该集团的风险隐患。【原文：Some LVMH shareholders are seeking clarity on how and to whom Bernard Arnault plans to hand over leadership of the luxury giant he has been steering for almost 40 years, saying the lack of transparency is increasingly becoming a risk for the group.】

item.title: 瑞安航空上调票价增长预期，因2026年初预订量强劲
item.description: 瑞安航空周一上调了截至3月31日的财年平均票价增长预期，并表示全年税后利润可能比去年高出约三分之一。【原文：Ryanair on Monday upgraded its forecast for average fare growth for its financial year, which ends on March 31, and said full-year after-tax profit was likely to be around one-third higher than last year.】

item.title: 消息人士称，法国主要广播公司寻求修订媒体法以加入欧洲并购浪潮
item.description: 三名知情人士透露，法国广播公司M6及其股东达飞海运正推动改革该国沿用数十年的媒体法规，此举可能刺激并购交易，助力法国媒体企业与全球竞争对手抗衡。【原文：French broadcaster M6 and its shareholder CMA CGM are pushing for reform of the country's decades-old media rules, three sources familiar with the matter said, potentially spurring M&A deals to help France's media players compete with global rivals.】

item.title: 分析师称，随着地缘政治因素和央行购金推动金价上涨，黄金仍有上涨空间。
item.description: 这种避险金属今年已上涨逾17%，此前在2025年飙升了64%。【原文：The safe-haven metal is up more than 17% this year, after soaring 64% in 2025.】

item.title: 早盘行情：日元剧烈波动令市场神经紧绷
item.description: 安库尔·班纳吉带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 日元兑美元汇率大幅跳涨，因日本干预汇率的风险加剧
item.description: 日元汇率持续飙升，拖累美元在多国市场走弱。市场对利率的密切关注令投资者高度警惕，担忧美日两国可能实施15年来首次联合干预汇率的风险。【原文：Japan's yen is surging and dragging down the dollar across markets, as rate checks have investors on high alert over the risks of the first joint U.S.-Japan currency intervention in 15 years.】

item.title: 油价维持涨势，伊朗持续令投资者感到不安
item.description: 油价周一延续涨势，此前一个交易日已攀升逾2%。尽管哈萨克斯坦主要出口管道已全面恢复运行，但美伊紧张局势仍令投资者如坐针毡。【原文：Oil prices extended gains on Monday after climbing more than 2% in the previous session, as tensions between the U.S. and Iran kept investors on edge even after Kazakhstan's main export pipeline resumed full operations.】

item.title: 日元飙升，干预风险隐现，黄金突破每盎司5000美元
item.description: 周一早盘，金价飙升至每盎司5000美元上方。此前动荡的一周里，格陵兰岛和伊朗局势引发的市场情绪震荡持续发酵，而债券市场暴跌与日元剧烈波动后，市场情绪仍如坐针毡。【原文：Gold surged past $5,000 per ounce early on Monday following a turbulent week where tensions over Greenland and Iran rattled sentiment, while ​markets remained on tenterhooks after a rout in bonds and violent spikes in the yen.】

item.title: 油田服务公司贝克休斯公布季度调整后利润增长11%
item.description: 贝克休斯周日报告称，第四季度经调整利润增长11%，其天然气技术设备与服务的需求增长完全抵消了油田服务与设备业务的疲软表现。【原文：Baker Hughes on Sunday reported an 11% rise in adjusted profit for the fourth quarter as demand for its gas technology equipment and services more than offset weakness in its oilfield services and equipment business.】

item.title: 消息人士称三星将于下月启动HBM4芯片量产，为英伟达供货
item.description: 知情人士周一向路透社透露，三星电子计划下月启动新一代高带宽内存（HBM）芯片——即HBM4的量产，并将向英伟达供货。【原文：Samsung Electronics plans to start production of its next-generation high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips, or HBM4, starting next month and supply them to Nvidia , a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 日元走强，市场密切关注干预动向
item.description: 周一早盘交易中，日元走强拖累美元全面走低。市场对日元可能面临干预的预期保持警惕，投资者在美联储会议及可能公布美联储主席人选前削减美元头寸。【原文：A rising yen dragged the dollar broadly lower in early trade on Monday, with markets on alert about the prospect of intervention in the yen and investors cutting dollar positions ahead of a Federal Reserve meeting and possible Fed chair announcement.】

item.title: 金价飙升至每盎司5000美元以上创历史新高
item.description: 黄金价格周一飙升至历史新高，突破每盎司5000美元大关，延续了历史性涨势。随着地缘政治紧张局势加剧，投资者纷纷寻求避险资产。【原文：Gold jumped to a record high, topping the $5,000 an ​ounce milestone on Monday, ‌extending a historic rally as investors sought the safe-haven asset amid rising geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 解读：新加坡独特货币政策如何运作
item.description: 新加坡央行采取了一种独特的货币政策管理方式：通过调整本币汇率来调控经济，而非像许多经济体那样改变国内利率。【原文：Singapore's central bank has a unique method of managing monetary policy, tweaking the exchange rate of its currency instead of changing domestic interest rates like many economies.】

item.title: 新加坡料将维持货币政策不变，因经济增长表现强劲
item.description: 新加坡预计将在周四的货币政策评估中维持政策不变，因半导体出口需求强劲支撑经济增长前景，且通胀率预计可控。【原文：Singapore is expected to leave monetary policy unchanged at a review on Thursday, with the growth outlook supported by strong demand for semiconductor exports and inflation seen under control.】

item.title: 油田服务公司贝克休斯公布季度调整后利润增长11%
item.description: 贝克休斯周日报告称，第四季度经调整利润增长11%，其天然气技术设备与服务的需求增长完全抵消了油田服务与设备业务的疲软表现。【原文：Baker Hughes on Sunday reported an 11% rise in adjusted profit for the fourth quarter as demand for its gas technology equipment and services more than offset weakness in its oilfield services and equipment.】
